question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. yellow traffic sign
B. traffic light
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The traffic light is mounted higher on a utility pole in the background, while the yellow sign is closer to the foreground, making their depth relationship ambiguous without a depth map.
